question.ask: 1. How do you like your new English teacher?

std.value: She is friendly to all of us.
std.ai: She is friendly to all of us.

std.value: Oh, she is the best teacher I have ever met.
std.ai: Oh, she is the best teacher I have ever met.

std.value: I like her as well as her lessons.
std.ai: I like her as well as her lessons.

std.value: She is nice to all of us.
std.ai: She is nice to all of us.

std.value: She is a very nice teacher.
std.ai: She is a very nice teacher.

std.value: I like her lessons. They’re interesting.
std.ai: I like her lessons. They’re interesting.

std.value: She’s really nice. I like her very much.
std.ai: She’s really nice. I like her very much.

std.value: We all like her. She makes the class lively and interesting.
std.ai: We all like her. She makes the class lively and interesting.

std.value: He’s a little shy but we like him.
std.ai: He’s a little shy but we like him.

std.value: I am happy to hear that.

std.value: You are always the best in my heart.
